name: Cygnus Pizza Race (itch)
description:
Compete against the galaxy’s finest pizza delivery wannabes in this high-speed thrill ride! Challenge your friendships and sabotage your friends in two-person, head-to-head local races that put your piloting skills to the test in . . . The Cygnus Pizza Race!

A new level and a new tournament happen each month this year! 

Linux support is currently in BETA, so do be aware. We recommend an Nvidia card and Ubuntu 20.04+ for Linux. AMD is currently not supported for Linux, but we're working on it.
